posts.post_content:
I have the follwing cards for sale:

T206 Mike Donlin (seated) Piedmont 150 subjects New York Giants PSA 3 $34

T206 Izzy Hoffman Portrait Providence Sweet Caporal SGC A $24 (Looks NM but is slightly trimmed on top border)

T206 Roger Bresnahan Portrait St. Louis Cardinals F/G $SOLD :) (Very nice portrait that appears NM but is down-graded due to some chipping and paper loss on the bottom border of the front.  Also, the back shows some paper loss as well.  Still a gorgeous card.)

All cards would make wonderful additions to any collection.  Lmk if interested [url]jabiloxi@aol.com[/url].

Thanks.
Bresnahan Sold- prices reduced on remianing cards.
